item.title: Introduction to R Markdown
item.description: Two of our esteemed OPIGlets presented a workshop on collaborative research using Jupyter Notebook this week at ISMB in Chicago. Their workshop highlights the importance of finding ways to share your work conveniently and reproducibly. So on a related note, I thought I would share a brief introduction to another useful tool, R Markdown with RStudio, which I use to present updates to various supervisors and to remember what I did three months (or three days) ago. This method of sharing work is highly readable, reproducible, and narrative-driven.
